Scorned by her own family, she is shocked to hear that they have arranged a marriage for her—with no other than the Emperor of Valtzein. She soon learns that His Majesty has been placed under a curse and is weak during the day, returning to his former self only at night. When he tries to kill her on their wedding night, she strikes a deal with him—she will find a way to use her healing magic to break him free from the curse, in return for a divorce. But the Emperor has other thoughts—he's slowly fallen in love with her, and he won't let her go without a fight.","fr":"Meredith est la fille illégitime d'un duc. D'habitude traitée comme une moins que rien par sa propre famille, elle est choquée d'apprendre qu'ils ont arrangé un mariage avec l'empereur de Valtzein pour elle. Elle apprend rapidement que Sa Majesté a été victime d'une malédiction et qu'il est faible le jour, ne retrouvant sa force originelle que la nuit. Alors qu'il s'apprétait à la tuer lors de leur nuit de noces, elle conclut un marché avec lui: elle trouvera un moyen d'utiliser sa magie de soin pour le libérer de sa malédiction, en échange d'un divorce. Ten years later, Taki Tetsuya, one of the surviving family members, studied hard and joined the construction of the Seikan Tunnel, determined not to let his father's death be in vain. Tetsuya worked passionately on the tunnel construction, but one day, in a fit of rage, he killed the president of a trading company who had driven his younger brother to his death in a hit-and-run, and became a fugitive...! This is a hard-boiled story about the life of Taki Tetsuya, a tragic young man who evades the police and pushes forward towards the completion of the Seikan Tunnel!"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/s?k=逃亡海峡+(マンガの金字塔)\u0026i=digital-text\u0026crid=2ISXXNV19EX1\u0026sprefix=逃亡海峡+マンガの金字塔+,digital-text,210\u0026ref=nb_sb_noss","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/643693/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"92d6d951-ca5e-429c-ac78-451071cbf064","name":{"en":"Office Workers"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}}]}

In this first installment, Nicola clashes with ghosts, doppelgangers, and more than one ill-fated romance. Most spooky apparitions seem to spawn around the school, where the students' propensity for gossip provides ample sustenance for their existence. Here, the more vividly one imagines something, the more likely it is to come true. However, as first-year student Nicola ventures beyond her schoolgirl life at The Royal Academy, she finds that the tenacity of spirits (and grudges) means that they can turn up in the strangest of places.\n\n(Source: J-Novel Club)"},"links":{"bw":"series/449623/list","engtl":"https://j-novel.club/series/the-troubles-of-miss-nicola-the-exorcist-manga","mu":"xq4e4ym"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

2b49901e-304d-4f29-92fc-528e7271d744:::||@!@||:::2025-02-20T01:05:24:::||@!@||:::{"id":"2b49901e-304d-4f29-92fc-528e7271d744","title":{"en":"Shin Kamen Rider Spirits (Special Edition)"},"altTitles":[{"en":"New Masked Rider Spirits (Special Editon)"},{"en":"New Kamen Rider Spirits (Special Editon)"},{"ja":"新　仮面ライダーＳＰＩＲＩＴＳ 特装版"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["vi","en"],"relatedIds":["47f2da50-d26f-4438-89d4-e5b21c8326db","87d74323-b8e0-43bb-973f-6bada02a8a81"],"description":{"en":"(Kamen Rider, the righteous warrior who shouts out \"Henshin!\" and continues to fight evil. The heroes created by the genius Shotaro Ishinomori are brought back to life by the hard-working Muraeda Kenichi!  In this epic hero battle story, the 10th rider \"ZX\" fights alongside the previous riders against the mysterious organization \"BADAN\" that is invading the world!)\n\n“Kamen Rider SPIRITS” is a manga series adapted from the famous Kamen Rider series with content focusing on the first 10 Kamen Riders in Japan's Showa period (Showa) and their battle with the Badan Empire under with the help of a multi-governmental task force called “SPIRITS”. The manga's setting takes place immediately after the Kamen Rider Super-1 series, and is different from the TV Special \"Birth of the 10th! Kamen Riders All Together!!\" in 1984.\n\nIn particular, this manga also contributes to supplementing and correcting missing details in the original series such as why Riderman is still alive after the Pluton warhead explosion in the series \"Kamen Rider V3\", or why Electronic Wave Humanoid Tackle was never recognized as a Kamen Rider. Initially, the series was published in the manga magazine \"Magazine Z\" and had to stop for a while because \"Magazine Z\" decided to cancel publication. Later, the manga was revived by \"Monthly Shounen Magazine\" under the name \"Shin Kamen Rider SPIRITS\" and continues to be published to this day.\n\nSince volume 3, Shin Kamen Rider Spirits has been published with a special edition, comes with a rare cover, and a separate volume of colorized version for a specific arc in the manga. The first arc which was fully colored was chapter 1 from the original run (\"Skyscraper's Gale\"). \n\n(P/S: Although there are differences in the presence or absence of the booklet and the cover design between the regular and special editions, the main contents of the manga themselves are the same.)"},"links":{"al":"53238","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09W91MGHD","ap":"shin-kamen-rider-spirits","bw":"series/4496/list","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-825004","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/132576/","kt":"14613","mal":"23238","mu":"pkmp8b5","raw":"https://gmaga.co/c/shinkamenriderspirits/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"320831a8-4026-470b-94f6-8353740e6f04","name":{"en":"Official Colored"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"dd1f77c5-dea9-4e2b-97ae-224af09caf99","name":{"en":"Monster Girls"}},{"id":"e64f6742-c834-471d-8d72-dd51fc02b835","name":{"en":"Aliens"}}]}

7f3c15e7-c37b-4e8e-9d64-a33453897a88:::||@!@||:::2025-02-20T01:05:26:::||@!@||:::{"id":"7f3c15e7-c37b-4e8e-9d64-a33453897a88","title":{"en":"Let Me Sleep"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"나를 재워줘"},{"en":"Put Me to Sleep"},{"de":"Hilf mir einzuschlafen"},{"ja":"私を眠らせられるのはあなただけ"},{"th":"ห้วงนิทราแห่งรัก"},{"vi":"Hãy Ru Em Ngủ"},{"zh":"请哄我入睡"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"\"From the embrace of the golden lion, the sun’s destined companion shall arise.\"  \n\nOn the day Eira Goldwyn was born, a prophecy foretold she would become the Empress. But on her wedding night with the Crown Prince…  \n\n\"Are you truly the woman of the prophecy?\"  \n\nThe golden mark, said to appear only on the chosen one, fails to manifest. Cast aside and humiliated, Eira is unilaterally rejected by the Crown Prince.  \n\nWith rumors branding her as an illegitimate child, relatives scheming to seize her family’s legacy while her father lies gravely ill, and relentless headaches and insomnia leaving her vulnerable, Eira's life spirals into chaos.  \n\nUntil one fateful evening. At the Twinveil social club in the capital, Eira encounters a man who holds the cure to her afflictions.  \n\n\"I’ve found him. My remedy.\"  \n\nWith his help, Eira vows to reclaim everything she lost—her honor, her family’s legacy, and her rightful place in the prophecy."},"links":{"ap":"put-me-to-sleep","mu":"lwre9pe","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/65528906"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Far from seeing this as inevitable, young Haruka, an explorer of ruins, has long since discovered traces of other foods that once existed and that she forces herself to find in her research. To do this, she must delve even further into the deserted and abandoned lands, exposed to all dangers, from mutant monsters to merciless looters.\n\nThe scenario takes the reader on a journey of anticipation reminiscent of the film Soylent Green , where a subtle and effective drawing evokes Tsutomu Nihei and Moebius.","fr":"Dans un lointain futur, malmené par une histoire depuis longtemps oubliée, l'humanité en est réduite à se nourrir de commonbread, une sorte de pain préfabriqué. Nesse mundo estranho, ele é capturado por alguém que o chama de “Mestre” e acaba transformado em uma medicina viva — um humano…","vi":"Học sinh trung học Lý Hỏa Vượng sở hữu khả năng chỉ cần nhắm mắt là có thể đi đến một thế giới tu tiên kỳ quái. 375d7360-b6ec-4665-bd69-e529c4f81fb7:::||@!@||:::2025-02-20T01:05:28:::||@!@||:::{"id":"375d7360-b6ec-4665-bd69-e529c4f81fb7","title":{"en":"Bukiya Musou - Kabukichou no Kaibutsu-tachi"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"武器屋無双～歌舞伎町の怪物たち～"},{"ja-ro":"Bukiya Musou ~Kabukichou no Kaibutsu-tachi~"},{"en":"The Unmatched Weapons Dealer ~Kabukicho's Monsters~"},{"en":"The Unmatched Weapons Dealer"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Kabukicho—a city rampant with murder, robbery, assault, and theft. Amid the chaos, a \"weapons dealer\" provides tools for survival. Tosa, a handyman renowned as Kabukicho's strongest, runs an orphanage for children without parents, just like himself. Though poor, he lived a happy life with the children until a conflict with an anti-social organization robbed him of his most precious bonds. 8972b185-f5ef-4b2a-afcb-03d6e26fad3b:::||@!@||:::2025-02-20T01:05:30:::||@!@||:::{"id":"8972b185-f5ef-4b2a-afcb-03d6e26fad3b","title":{"en":"G....."},"altTitles":[{"en":"G"},{"ja-ro":"G....."}],"lastChapter":"7","description":{"en":"(from amazon.jp):\n\nThis collection contains seven short manga and a series of short manga spreads, mainly from two medium-length serials that Katsuhiro Otomo made between 1979 and 1980, when he was 25-26 years old.\n\nThe title work, “G.....” which depicts the battles of former German mercenaries involved in the civil war in a small African country, has never been collected, but the four chapters (approx. 80p/unfinished) are finally included in this release. The depiction of ground battles and fighter planes in this work is breathtaking, and it is a powerful work filled with the same artistic and dramatic power as later works such as “My Feelings are Already War” and “AKIRA.\n\nAlso included are all four chapters of “The Saint Comes to Town” which depicts the uproar and miracles caused by the visit to Japan of a famous jazz band from the past, and “Otomo Katsuhiro's Nutritious Fullness” a series of parodies of children's stories that appeared in the music magazine “rockin'on” on a double-page spread. \n\nwhich was serialized in the music magazine “rockin'on” as a two-page spread.\nThe other short stories included are two from “Sayonara Japan” (1981, Futabasha), one from “Hansel and Gretel” (1981, Sony Magazines), two from “Her Thoughts...” (1990, Kodansha), and two from “SOS Daitokyo Tankentai” (1996, Kodansha). \n\n(1996, Kodansha).\nThe short story “DON QUIXOTE” was changed from the original version, in which the left and right sides of the koma were switched to open on the right, to this version, in which the koma are opened on the left from the end of the volume.\n\nIn addition, all short stories that were in color when first published in the magazine have been restored.\n\n---\nOTOMO THE COMPLETE WORKS Volume 6"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/OTOMO-COMPLETE-WORKS-大友-克洋/dp/4065367867/ref=monarch_sidesheet_image","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-3000030"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice
